articles.title: NASA's InSight records monster quake on Mars - Phys.org

articles.title: Science breakthrough after 'incredible' dinosaur fossil found from day asteroid hit Earth - Express
articles.description: SCIENTISTS were amazed to discover a dinosaur fossil believed to be from the exact day the infamous asteroid hit the Earth and wiped the reptiles out.
